data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 30386, Version Hash: 964aab50f0eb28f40a69d5d4f1381ac640307481
data.actual_result: Shows the old song playing, before "Private Session", counting to the end, freezes and disappears the spotify info
data.expected_result: The information about the current song should update
data.short_description: Incorrect information shown after disabling private session on Spotify
data.steps_to_repro: - Listen to music on spotify (to speed it up, put it at almost the end of the song) - Click on your name, on any chat - Go to spotify and click on "Private Session" (similar to #8375) - Change music - Disable "Private Session"
